item.title: Sofitel SO Bangkok announces the chef lineup for So Amazing Chefs 2015
item.description:
Source: Sofitel SO Bangkok.Â The Sofitel SO Bangkok has announced that 12 world-renowned chefs will be in Thailand for the 4th So Amazing Chefs event, happening from October 6th to 11th, 2015. Yves Mudry, General Manager of Sofitel SO Bangkok shared, “This year’s food festival is our most prestigious yet, featuring an incredible lineup of chefs with a combined seven Michelin stars. This event highlights Bangkok’s status as a culinary destination and fosters the exchange of culinary ideas and inspiration...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/sofitel-so-bangkok-announces-the-chef-lineup-for-so-amazing-chefs-2015/
